Html:
Hello,

I want to extend zoom interactions with multi-touch interaction in win 7 touch based devices like microsoft surface or other  windows 7 based touch devices.

How should I start to do that ? Do I need to code all the layout generation code to support mufti-touch interaction or just improving the methods with events ?

 

Any advice to start will be highly appreciated.

Hi there,

any news on this topic? Having the same problem, any help would be appreciated!

 

Greeting,
